channel.title: Few easy questions
channel.description: So I'm probably gonna get back into RSPS again and I have a couple of questions. How do you make it so that npcs move? You know how you would make a npc move in a certain area.(I partially remember how you just get the coords and put them in some order) What vps do you recommend? What's a good empty base, there was one called devo 7 I think that was empty but that was like a year ago so it is probably gone. ehh and can I change this shitty name.

item.title: Few easy questions
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“mclovinscape, post:4, topic:406232”]Hmm thanks guys
edit - I’m looking for a 317 base, so is PI or whatever 317?[/quote]
90% of PI’s are 474+, but if you look hard, you can find a 317 one.
I believe there is one called Project Mara.
Google it, and it has Client + Server packaged.

Read full topic

item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

Get Blitz:

try 1and1.com it seems pretty nice

Apparently that’s one big scam. Lol.
Don’t flame, cause I don’t know that for sure. Just heard things.

[quote=“mclovinscape, post:4, topic:406232”]Hmm thanks guys
edit - I’m looking for a 317 base, so is PI or whatever 317?[/quote]
Yup. Look around the Server Downloads for something that says “PI”.

item.title: Few easy questions
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

Since all have been answered, I use vStarVPS for my VPS. (; Good customer service, I wouldn’t use VPSLand - good luck having a reply 2-3 days later on a issue. There downtime is terrible too, imo.

Base - if you want to join the rest of Mopar, use Project Insanity[PI].
<3

Read full topic

item.title: Few easy questions
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

mclovinscape:

How do you make it so that npcs move?

What base are you using? If PI (Project Insanity), go to spawn-config.cfg and you will see something like:

I shall attempt to color coordinate it for you. (This was a random coordinate I found for my Poison Spiders)
spawn = 134 3069 10255 0 1 5 10 12

Red = NPC Id
Green = X Coordinate
Blue = Y Coordinate
Orange = Height
Purple = How many steps it walks around
Lime Green = Max Hit
Navy = Attack Stats
Pink = Defence Stats

mclovinscape:

What vps do you recommend?

I HATE VpsLand, mostly because their customer service is terrible.
I use Tektonic, even though it is rather expensive, it is 24/7 customer service and they are very helpful 99% of the time. Do lots of research before buying a VPS.

mclovinscape:

What’s a good empty base, there was one called devo 7 I think that was empty but that was like a year ago so it is probably gone.

Are you looking for a newer source like 604 or old school like 317?

Read full topic
